content: this legal case involves a dispute over a property between two parties the case started in the municipal court varaždin and has now reached the county court pula in its second instance the procedure has been ongoing for over a year the firstinstance court has decided to dissolve the coownership of the property which includes a courtyard a house and an auxiliary building the petitioner owns 34 of the property while the opposing party owns 14 the dissolution will be achieved through a courtordered sale at a public auction and the proceeds will be distributed among the coowners based on their respective shares the decision is based on the property act and the law on ownership of real rights the opposing partys objection regarding the right to housing has been rejected as the focus of the case is on the dissolution of coownership rather than eviction the process involves replacing the property with its equivalent value in cash
